title: Shoulder-a-Coffin Kuro, Vol. 1
description: Regularly mistaken for a boy and/or vampire, the traveler Kuro roams the land, clothed in black from head to toe, a Kuro-sized coffin on her back. Accompanied by her snarky bat friend, Sen, the mysterious duo meets all sorts of individuals en route - some good, some evil, some just plain crazy! But Kuro never stays in one place for long, begging the What exactly is she searching for? And what exactly does she intend to do with that coffin?!
author: Satoko Kiyuduki
